definition: variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

pinyin: shu4 ju4 lian4 lu4 lian2 jie1 biao1 zhi4

sentences.english: No other plug-in can share the same identifier.
sentences.chinese: 任何其他插件都不能共用相同的標識符。

sentences.english: The identifications of equipments and their components should be easy to trace.
sentences.chinese: 材料和設備散件的標識應易於進行跟蹤。

sentences.english: Shanghai All-light Photoelectric Technology Inc. (SALPT) is a professional manufacturer for the production of guiding marker and super-thin light box.
sentences.chinese: 上海奧麗光電專業生產標識導向，導光板超薄燈箱。

sentences.english: Are in-stock and in-process materials properly identified and controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否對在倉庫和在製程的物料進行適當地標識和控制？

sentences.english: Holidays indicated by the detector shall be marked with chalk or felt-tip marker to identify the area to be repaired.
sentences.chinese: 漏塗儀顯示的漏塗區域用粉筆或氈制粗頭筆標識。

sentences.english: Finally, make sure the "Stop If True" flag is turned on.
sentences.chinese: 最後，確保打開了“爲真則停止”標識。

sentences.english: The functions of the signage and wayfinding system are dual.
sentences.chinese: 標識導向系統所發揮的功能是雙重的。

sentences.english: For example, callbacks can be used to provide the details for the new identity.
sentences.chinese: 例如，回調可用於爲新的標識提供詳細的信息。

sentences.english: Each list and view is uniquely identified with a GUID.
sentences.chinese: 每個列表和視圖都通過GUID來唯一標識。

sentences.english: Any value may be assigned to the blank identifier.
sentences.chinese: 任何值都可以爲空白標識符賦值。

sentences.english: The signs must contain a pictogram to convey the message, instead of relying solely on text.
sentences.chinese: 除文字外，這些警告標識應包含圖形來傳達警告信息。

sentences.english: The vehicle, painted white with a red crescent, was parked at the clinic entrance, where Osama was busily cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 車漆成白色，噴上紅新月標識，停在醫院門口。

sentences.english: It is recommended, though, to enumerate the logical identifiers explicitly.
sentences.chinese: 建議明確地枚舉這些邏輯標識。

sentences.english: So, we introduce fragment identifiers for the speakers as well.
sentences.chinese: 所以，對於演講者，我們仍舊使用片段標識。

sentences.english: The sign here indicated where I should go.
sentences.chinese: 這個標識表記標幟指出了我該去的地方。

sentences.english: The non-unique hardware identification represents the configuration of your computer at the time of activation.
sentences.chinese: 非唯一硬件標識符代表激活時您的計算機的配置。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
